original: 已遣人對<color=#fff999>$country1</color>使用趁火打劫計謀成功，獲得了<color=#13ccd7>金錢 $num1</color>！與我方友好度略有下降…(<color=#bceea7>趁火打劫 成功</color>)
text: The person sent to <color=#fff999>$country1</color> succeeded in using the looting strategy and obtained <color=#13ccd7>money $num1</color>! The friendship with us has declined slightly...(<color=#bceea7>Successfully robbed the fire</color>)
